characters.story: "DYEN!" the flag, together and missile command sharply - a ceremonial hall, palace and temple!
"DAI!" he commands sharply - to have on, wear and don!
"YEE!" the different wings command sharply - wings, feathers for the clan!
"FUN!" the rice and different command sharply - dung, manure and fertilizer!
"JWAN!" the fingers and two snakeskins and together command sharply - to compose, write and author!
The mouth and asia bend down drooping - mute, silent and speechless!
"HOO?" the soldier, crown and asia question curiously - is this a kettle, a teapot and pot?
"SHYEH!" the insect commands sharply - a crab, shellfish with claws!
"SHYEH!" the state of mind commands sharply - being lax, slack and relaxed!
"GOH!" the shells command sharply - to purchase, buy and acquire!
"GOH!" the water sings cheerfully - a ditch, a trench for the generation gap!
"YAO!" the metal commands sharply - the key to unlock and access!
"YOO!" the bamboo, study group and page command sharply - to plead, appeal and beg!
"TSUH!" the tome commands sharply - a Vol, a book to register!
"SHAN!" the saber sings cheerfully - to delete, remove and erase!
"JAH!" the tree commands sharply - a palisade, a fence of stakes!
"SHAN!" the jewel sings cheerfully - coral, a reef and name!
"BYEN!" the road commands sharply - everywhere, all over to remind!
